UI: Content Card

Location Card

The Location Card displays travel destinations, venues, and points of interest. Features address, geographic coordinates, hours of operation, contact information, photos, amenities/features, and ratings. Uses Schema.org/Place markup for local search.

Golden Gate Bridge

Iconic suspension bridge connecting San Francisco to Marin County. One of the most photographed structures in the world.
